body:
Ok so I've been thinking about this for a long time and I've decided to upgrade to emerald but I dotn have the link to the site where it is possible to upgrade but I have also been wondering if I could buy another gold donator rank and instantly upgrade to emerald donar. Please could someone answer this for me if this is not possible could someone link me to where I can upgrade



Also tell me if this is bad grammar ^^^ :P

title: A Quick Question

replies.body: When I click on buy it says you are not allowed to purchase this item
replies.body_tagged: When I click on buy it says you are not allowed to purchase this item

replies.body:
Here is what you do:

Buy another gold, then contact a manager or Director on Skype, give them the proof that you bought another gold, and then they should be able to help you out. If you don't have Skype, just buy the gold, then post on here again saying you bought it.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: That can happen sometimes, just buy another gold and notify the admins.
replies.body_tagged: That can happen sometimes, just buy another gold and notify the admins.
